name: Mikoyan-Gurevich MiG-15Bis
description:
The Mikoyan-Gurevich MiG-15 is a jet fighter aircraft developed by Mikoyan-Gurevich for the Soviet Union. 

The MiG-15 was one of the first successful jet fighters to incorporate swept wings to achieve high transonic speeds.

MiG-15bis is an improved single-seat fighter version.
